repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Kalaprakasika, is the standard Book on the Election (Mahoortha) system. Intertitles are not mentioed always.

msItem.title: Kālaprakāśika. Adhyāya 1-40
msItem.author: Nṛsiṃha Suri

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 04 pp: 32—33 VOHD II,7: p;964 entry. 2940

msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śuddhasvaṭīkasaṃkāśaṃ ratnasiṃhāsane sthitaṃ . padmayāsahitanityaṃ narasiṃhaṃ bhajāmahe karāṃvindojvalakaṃ bhuvakraḥ kapālabhuk
msItem.explicit: 101v 1 vidvāsassarvabhutahaiṣiṇaḥ . ānena vidhīvat kuryāt vidhānaṃ yovicakṣaṇaḥ . anantaṃ puṇyamāpnotiśiṣṭalokeṣu pūjyate 101v 2 sarvapāpāni naśyanti sarvābhiṣṭañca sidhyati . .
msItem.finalRubric: 101v 2 iti śrīnṛsiṃmhasuriviracitāyāṃ kālaprakāśikāyām catvāriṃśo dhyā 101v 3 yaḥ .. .. jyotiśśāstrarahasyaṃ yatta sarsam suprakāśitaṃ śrīnṛsīmhaviduṣā lokānugrahakāmyayāmadhyanena nima 101v 4 dhyabhāprakatijajñānena samyaktarājñoti śāstramudrapārapaṇitā tat sarvasārmṛtaṃ .. bhumitirjarajīvanāyavaradācārya 101v 5 bharasenāmunā bhāradvājakulinamattyahariṇā vidvadvareṇo?taṃ ye graṃthāḥ prāktanaiḥ proktā suribhiḥ jyotiṣe 101v 6 purā nṛsīṃhasūriracitaprabandhena na te samāḥ . kālaprakāśikā nāmnīṃ nṛsīmhaviduṣā kṛtā taṃ ye paṭhanti dvijāste syusarva 102r 1 jñānaikaviśrutāḥ .. hariḥ oṃ śūbhamastu karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ .. …
msItem.colophon: 102r 4 dundubhināmasaṃvatsare dakṣiṇāyane grīṣmaṛtau āṣāḍhamāse kṛṣṇapakṣe saptamyāṃ saumyavāsare revatīnakṣatre 102r 5 sukarmanāmayoge bhavakaraṇe asmindine nemilī kāśyapagotraśeṣādrīya putreṇa tirumalācalu kālaprakāśikajyotiśśāstram 102v 1 svahastalikhitam .. śrīrukmiṇīsatyabhāmāsametaśrīveṇugopālasvāmine namaḥ . 102v 2 śrīvardhanasamahāgurave namaḥ 102v 3 śrīgovindāya namaḥ 102v 4 śrīkṛṣṇāya namaḥ

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin.
supportDesc.condition: good with some broken palm leaves.

additions.desc: In the left margin of 1v hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu.
On 1v title is written in the left margin kālaprakāśikā. On 3v title puṃsavana in the left margin.

origin.origDate: According to colophon this manuscript was completed in the year dundubhi which can approximately be between 1802-1922, on Monday the 7th day of the dark fortnight of month of June . It was written in Tirumalācala. It was written by nemilī who was born to śeṣādrī family of kāśyapa clan.

listBibl.bibl: Kalaprakasika, The standard Book on the Election (Mahoortha) system. With original Text is Devanagari and English Translation to which are added An introduction to the Study of Astrology Explanatory Notes, Appendix, Illustrations etc. N P Subramania Iyer Asian Educational Services New Delhi 1982

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
